headline: Supermicro Announces New AI Factory Cluster Solutions Based on NVIDIA Enterprise Reference Architectures and NVIDIA Blackwell AI Infrastructure to Simplify the Deployment of AI at Scale
summary: Supercomputing Conference -- Super Micro Computer, Inc. (SMCI), a Total IT Solution Provider for AI/ML, HPC, Cloud, Storage, and 5G/Edge, is announcing new complete, turnkey solutions to simplify deployment and accelerate time-to-online for AI factories. Based on NVIDIA Enterprise Reference Architectures and NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs, the new rack-scale clusters are fully integrated and validated by Supermicro, and delivered as full-stack solutions, complete with the NVIDIA software stack and NVIDIA

headline: 13 Fallen S&P 500 Stocks Slip Into Bear Market
summary: Now that the AI stock bubble is bursting, it was only a matter of time for the pain to spread. You can see it in the S&P 500.

raw.headline: 13 Fallen S&P 500 Stocks Slip Into Bear Market
raw.summary: Now that the AI stock bubble is bursting, it was only a matter of time for the pain to spread. You can see it in the S&P 500.

headline: Asian shares sink, tracking a tech-led sell-off on Wall Street
summary: Asian shares tumbled on Tuesday, with benchmarks in Tokyo and Seoul sinking more than 3%, after Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence -related shares pulled U.S. stocks lower.  U.S. futures dropped, with the contract for the S&P 500 down 0.6% while the future for the Dow Jones Industrial Average was down 0.4%.  Computer chip giant Nvidia, at the center of the craze over AI, is due to report its earnings on Wednesday.

headline: 3 Stocks Under $50 to Target This Week
summary: Stocks trading between $10 and $50 can be particularly interesting as they frequently represent businesses that have survived their early challenges. However, investors should remain vigilant as some may still have unproven business models, leaving them vulnerable to the ebbs and flows of the broader market.
